import React, { Fragment } from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import Moment from 'react-moment' const PostItem = props => { const { auth, loading, addLike, removeLike, deletePost, eachPost, showActions } = props const { _id, name, avatar, user, likes, comments, date, text} = eachPost console.log(`PROPS: `, props) return (

{name}

{text}

Posted on {date}

{showActions && }
) } PostItem.propTypes = { eachPost: PropTypes.object.isRequired, auth: PropTypes.object.isRequired, addLike: PropTypes.func.isRequired, removeLike: PropTypes.func.isRequired, deletePost: PropTypes.func.isRequired } export default PostItem
